```{r}
score.dt <- mlr3resampling::score(bmr)
library(data.table)
score.wide <- dcast(
  score.dt,
  train.subsets + test.fold + test.subset + task_id ~ algorithm,
  value.var="regr.mse")
score.wide[is.na(cv_glmnet), cv_glmnet := featureless]
score.wide[is.na(tuned), tuned := featureless]
score.tall <- melt(
  score.wide,
  measure=c("tuned", "cv_glmnet", "featureless"),
  variable.name="algorithm",
  value.name="regr.mse")

library(ggplot2)
gg <- ggplot()+
  geom_text(aes(
    regr.mse, train.subsets, label=train.subsets),
    vjust=-0.5,
    hjust=1,
    data=data.table(regr.mse=Inf, train.subsets=c("same","other","all")))+
  geom_point(aes(
    regr.mse, train.subsets, color=algorithm),
    shape=1,
    data=score.tall)+
  facet_grid(test.subset ~ task_id, scales="free")+
  scale_x_log10()

ggsave("tuned_moving_pictures_results_6.png", plot = gg, 
       width = 50, height = 5, dpi = 200, limitsize = FALSE)

 #      width = 50, height = 5, dpi = 200, limitsize = FALSE)
```

```{r}
load("data-danny-same-other-cv-01-19.RData")
library(data.table) 
library(ggplot2)


score.wide <- dcast(
  score.dt,
  train.subsets + test.fold + test.subset + task_id ~ algorithm,
  value.var="regr.mse")

score.wide[is.na(cv_glmnet), cv_glmnet := featureless]
score.tall <- melt(
  score.wide,
  measure=c("cv_glmnet","featureless"),
  variable.name="algorithm",
  value.name="regr.mse")

# Filter score.tall by task_id
score.tall_filtered <- score.tall[task_id %in% c("Absidia", "Amphinema", "Bradyrhizobium", 
                                                 "Burkholderia", "Cellvibrio", "Cenococcum", "Chaetomium"), ]

score.tall_filtered <- score.tall_filtered[train.subsets %in% c("all"), ]

# Group by train.subsets, test.fold, task_id, algorithm and find mean of regr.mse
score.tall_filtered_mean <- score.tall_filtered[, .(regr.mse = mean(regr.mse)), by = .(train.subsets, test.fold, task_id, algorithm)]
score.tall_filtered_mean_new <- setcolorder(score.tall_filtered_mean[, test.subset := "All Samples"], c("train.subsets", "test.fold", "test.subset", "task_id", "algorithm", "regr.mse"))

# Row combine score.tall_filtered and score.tall_filtered_mean
score.tall_filtered_new <- rbindlist(list(score.tall_filtered, score.tall_filtered_mean))

score.tall_filtered_new$test.subset <- factor(score.tall_filtered_new$test.subset,
                                             levels = c("Habitat=soil", "Melanization=high", "Melanization=low", "All Samples"))

gg <- ggplot()+
  geom_point(aes(
    regr.mse, train.subsets, color=algorithm),
    shape=1,
    data=score.tall_filtered_new)+
  facet_grid(test.subset ~ task_id, scales="free")+
  scale_x_log10()
#png("data-danny-same-other-cv-figure-01-19.png", height=5, width=60, units="in", res=100)
png("data-danny-same-other-cv-figure-02-06_01.png", height=5, width=13, units="in", res=200)
print(gg)
dev.off()
```

```{r}
                                             levels = c("LassoCV",  "LogisticRegLassoCV", "Featureless"))

    regr.mse, train.subsets, color=algorithm),

print(gg)
dev.off()
```

# Binary Classification
```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

score.tall_filtered <- fread("~/Desktop/necromass/necromass_debug/necromass_debug/2024-02-09_11:36_classification_results_R.csv")

                                                 "Burkholderia", "Cellvibrio", "Cenococcum", "Chaetomium"), ]

                                             levels = c("LogisticRegressionCV", "FeaturelessClassifier"))
gg <- ggplot()+

    accuracy, train.subsets, color=algorithm),

png("data-danny-same-other-cv-figure-02-09.png", height=5, width=13, units="in", res=200)
print(gg)
```
